column16: ['PURLdb - DeadCode: Track end-of-life code and improve PURL coverage
column17: including syncing data from relevant projects.'
column18: 'PURLdb - PopularCode: Determine and track the popularity and usage of open-source code
column19: creating metrics based on dependency graphs and code freshness.'
column20: 'VulnerableCode: Process unstructured data: Mine unstructured data from various sources for unreported vulnerabilities using NLP techniques.'
column21: 'VulnerableCode: Add more data sources: Integrate additional vulnerability data sources and improve data collection methods.'
column22: 'VulnerableCode: On-demand live evaluation: Implement dynamic importation of vulnerability data based on specific package queries.'
column23: 'ScanCode.io: File-system tree view: Create a tree view for file systems in scanned packages to enhance exploration and detection issues.'
column24: 'ScanCode.io: Store/query downloaded packages: Enable storage of downloaded packages and provide an API for accessing these packages later.'
column25: 'ScanCode.io: CI/CD integration: Enhance ScanCode for use within CI/CD environments
column27: 'ScanCode Toolkit: Variable license sections: Support variable license sections in license rules to improve detection accuracy.'
column28: 'ScanCode Toolkit: Automatic marking of phrases: Utilize AI/NLP to automatically mark required phrases in license rules to reduce false positives.']

column16: ['KomMonitor: Migration of the KomMonitor Web Client from AngularJS to a modern Angular framework to enhance performance and maintainability.'
column17: 'LLM and GeoData: Development of an open-source implementation that connects spatial data with Large Language Models to improve search capabilities in spatial data infrastructures.'
column18: 'Weather Routing Tool: Enhancement of the existing Weather Routing Tool to introduce new features like ship speed optimization and improving the genetic algorithm for route planning.'
column19: "Your Idea: Opportunity for participants to propose their own project ideas related to 52°North's open source software initiatives
column21: 'KomMonitor: A web tool for monitoring geo-spatial data that is migrating from AngularJS to a modern Angular framework to improve compatibility
column24: 'LLM and GeoData: A project aimed at enhancing the search functionality within Research and Spatial Data Infrastructures by integrating Large Language Models with spatial data.'
column25: 'Weather Routing Tool: An enhancement project for the open-source Weather Routing Tool to optimize ship routes under varying weather conditions
column26: including new features like ship speed optimization and a more efficient consumption model.'
column27: 'Your Idea: Opportunity for candidates to propose their own software development projects that align with 52°North’s mission

Short Description: Scan code for origin
column16: ['PURLdb - DeadCode: Track end-of-life code and improve PURL coverage
column17: including syncing data from relevant projects.'
column18: 'PURLdb - PopularCode: Determine and track the popularity and usage of open-source code
column19: creating metrics based on dependency graphs and code freshness.'
column20: 'VulnerableCode: Process unstructured data: Mine unstructured data from various sources for unreported vulnerabilities using NLP techniques.'
column21: 'VulnerableCode: Add more data sources: Integrate additional vulnerability data sources and improve data collection methods.'
column22: 'VulnerableCode: On-demand live evaluation: Implement dynamic importation of vulnerability data based on specific package queries.'
column23: 'ScanCode.io: File-system tree view: Create a tree view for file systems in scanned packages to enhance exploration and detection issues.'
column24: 'ScanCode.io: Store/query downloaded packages: Enable storage of downloaded packages and provide an API for accessing these packages later.'
column25: 'ScanCode.io: CI/CD integration: Enhance ScanCode for use within CI/CD environments
column27: 'ScanCode Toolkit: Variable license sections: Support variable license sections in license rules to improve detection accuracy.'
column28: 'ScanCode Toolkit: Automatic marking of phrases: Utilize AI/NLP to automatically mark required phrases in license rules to reduce false positives.']

Short Description: Open source software for smart legal contracts
column16: ['Linter for Concerto: Develop a TypeScript linter for Concerto source files that enforces specific syntax and structure rules.'
column17: 'Decorator Command Set JSON<->YAML Convertor: Create a tool for converting verbose Decorator Command Set JSON to a more readable YAML format and vice-versa.'
column18: 'Accord Project Agreement Protocol: Update the Accord Project Agreement Protocol with a new Open API specification and implementation to enhance document and contract management features.'
column19: 'Specification Conformance Tests: Overhaul specification conformance testing by migrating to a more robust framework and creating a dedicated package for validating Concerto.'
column20: 'Incorporating AI into Template Playground: Enhance the Template Playground by integrating AI features for easier contract template creation
column23: 'Testing for Code Generation Targets: Implement a testing framework for validating generated code across multiple programming languages using Docker images in CI/CD pipelines.'
column24: 'Migration of Template Playground to use Tailwind CSS: Migrate the Template Playground application to Tailwind CSS to improve performance

Short Description: State of the art fuzzing for better security

Short Description: Many Traditions
column17: ['Automated coastline extraction for erosion modeling in Alaska: This project aims to develop a model for extracting coastlines from satellite imagery to improve predictions of coastal erosion in Alaska
column18: addressing issues related to climate change.'
column19: 'Support for Logarithmic Number Systems in a Deep-Learning Framework: This project focuses on integrating Logarithmic Number Systems (LNS) into deep learning frameworks to enhance computational efficiency in machine learning tasks.'
column20: "Developing Distributed Algorithm for Metagenomic Error Correction and Assembly: This project intends to create a distributed algorithm for error correction and assembly in metagenomic studies
column21: focusing on Alaska's unique microbial communities."
column22: 'Telehealth over L4S: The goal of this project is to optimize telehealth applications using Low Latency
column24: and Scalable Throughput (L4S) technology to enhance healthcare access in rural Alaska.'
column25: "Creating shareable 'albums' from locally stored DICOM images: This project aims to develop a utility for creating and sharing albums of DICOM images for research purposes
column26: facilitating easier access and organization of medical data."
column27: 'Beehive: Integrated Community Health Metrics Framework: This project seeks to create a digital repository of Outsider Art and health-related images to support marginalized communities in Alaska and their healthcare needs.'
column28: 'DICOM Image Retrieval and Processing in Matlab: This project aims to develop a framework in Matlab for processing DICOM images
column29: enhancing their usability in research and clinical applications.'
column30: 'Making ZeroMQ a first-class feature of concore: This project involves implementing ZeroMQ communication to improve a neuromodulation control system framework
column31: enhancing its adaptability for distributed environments.'
column32: 'Dynamic DICOM Endpoints: This project intends to create dynamic DICOM endpoints to optimize data transfer in healthcare settings
column34: 'Bio-Block: A Blockchain-based Data Repository and Payment Portal: This project aims to develop an open-source blockchain-based repository for biological data that empowers data owners with transparency and compensation.'
column35: 'Adopting Nunaliit for Alaska Native Healthcare Practices: This project focuses on enhancing the Nunaliit platform to better serve the digital healthcare needs of Alaska Native communities.'
column36: 'AWANTA: A Virtual Router based on RIPE Atlas Internet Measurements: This project aims to establish a virtual router utilizing RIPE Atlas measurements to improve internet connectivity and reliability in Alaska.'
column37: 'Alaska Wildfire Prediction Using Satellite Imagery: This project seeks to develop a hybrid deep learning model for predicting wildfire risks in Alaska by integrating satellite data and ground-based weather information.']
